mapper.select: SELECT id, order_number, contract_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state FROM ztt_order WHERE 1=1

SELECT id, order_number, contract_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state FROM ztt_order WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ztt_order ( id, order_number, contract_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{order_number}, #{contract_number}, #{client}, #{linkman}, #{product_name}, #{stardard}, #{attachment}, #{unit}, #{amount}, #{single_price}, #{sum_price}, #{End_data}, #{zttordertime}, #{apply_id}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ztt_order SET order_number = #{order_number}, contract_number = #{contract_number}, client = #{client}, linkman = #{linkman}, product_name = #{product_name}, stardard = #{stardard}, attachment = #{attachment}, unit = #{unit}, amount = #{amount}, single_price = #{single_price}, sum_price = #{sum_price}, End_data = #{End_data}, zttordertime = #{zttordertime}, apply_id = #{apply_id}, state = #{state} WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE ztt_order
order_number = #{order_number},
contract_number = #{contract_number},
client = #{client},
linkman = #{linkman},
product_name = #{product_name},
stardard = #{stardard},
attachment = #{attachment},
unit = #{unit},
amount = #{amount},
single_price = #{single_price},
sum_price = #{sum_price},
End_data = #{End_data},
zttordertime = #{zttordertime},
apply_id = #{apply_id},
state = #{state},
WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM ztt_order WHERE id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ztt_order ( id, order_number, contract_number, client, linkman, product_name, stardard, attachment, unit, amount, single_price, sum_price, End_data, zttordertime, apply_id, state ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.order_number}, #{item.contract_number}, #{item.client}, #{item.linkman}, #{item.product_name}, #{item.stardard}, #{item.attachment}, #{item.unit}, #{item.amount}, #{item.single_price}, #{item.sum_price}, #{item.End_data}, #{item.zttordertime}, #{item.apply_id}, #{item.state} )

update.foreach: UPDATE ztt_order SET order_number = #{item.order_number}, contract_number = #{item.contract_number}, client = #{item.client}, linkman = #{item.linkman}, product_name = #{item.product_name}, stardard = #{item.stardard}, attachment = #{item.attachment}, unit = #{item.unit}, amount = #{item.amount}, single_price = #{item.single_price}, sum_price = #{item.sum_price}, End_data = #{item.End_data}, zttordertime = #{item.zttordertime}, apply_id = #{item.apply_id}, state = #{item.state} WHERE id=#{item.id}

UPDATE ztt_order
order_number = #{item.order_number},
contract_number = #{item.contract_number},
client = #{item.client},
linkman = #{item.linkman},
product_name = #{item.product_name},
stardard = #{item.stardard},
attachment = #{item.attachment},
unit = #{item.unit},
amount = #{item.amount},
single_price = #{item.single_price},
sum_price = #{item.sum_price},
End_data = #{item.End_data},
zttordertime = #{item.zttordertime},
apply_id = #{item.apply_id},
state = #{item.state},
WHERE id=#{item.id}
